title: Rankings, contract projections for top 50 MLB free agents
content: How much will the biggest stars get paid this winter? Kiley McDaniel breaks down the 2025-26 free agent class.

title: Offseason rumors and buzz: What we're hearing as free agency begins
content: Will Tarik Skubal be dealt? Who could sign Kyle Schwarber and Kyle Tucker? The hot stove is ready to ignite.

title: Cowboys' Kneeland dies in apparent suicide at 24
content: Dallas Cowboys defensive end Marshawn Kneeland died Thursday morning from an apparent suicide following a police pursuit and vehicle crash, according to authorities.

title: Pads hire ex-reliever Stammen as new manager
content: The Padres have hired Craig Stammen, a former relief pitcher who retired just three years ago, to a three-year deal as their new manager, replacing Mike Shildt.

title: Massive fire heavily damages Spoelstra's home
content: Fire destroyed a home owned by Miami Heat coach Erik Spoelstra early Thursday, with officials saying more than 20 units were dispatched in what became a futile effort to save the property.

title: Ex-NU coach Fitzgerald 'vindicated' by settlement
content: Former Northwestern coach Pat Fitzgerald addressed his settlement with the coach and told ESPN's "College GameDay" podcast that he is actively seeking a return to the college sideline.

title: Federal lawsuit by Iowa college athletes dismissed
content: A lawsuit brought by more than 35 Iowa college athletes vs. state investigators was dismissed as a judge ruled the investigators had immunity in obtaining the athletes' sports wagering data, even though the search would be classified as unconstitutional.

title: Binnington tries to hide puck from Ovi's 900th goal
content: Blues goaltender Jordan Binnington was seen tucking away the puck from Alex Ovechkin's 900th goal into the back of his pants, before he eventually handed it over to a linesman.

title: Reyna returns; Pulisic, McKennie out for USMNT
content: USMNT head coach Mauricio Pochettino on Thursday named his 25-player roster for upcoming friendlies against Paraguay and Uruguay.

title: KAT 'still stunned' by trade as Knicks rout Wolves
content: Karl-Anthony Towns said after Wednesday's game that a year later, it's still "weird" to face his former teammates.

title: The NFL at midseason: Separating the good, bad and ugly for all 32 teams
content: The 2025 season has hit the midway point, and we have things to watch in the second half, key QB stats and fantasy nuggets for all 32 teams.

title: Barnwell's midseason awards: Ranking candidates for MVP, Rookie of the Year, more
content: Which QBs are in the MVP mix? Let's pick three front-runners for seven NFL awards through nine weeks.

title: Why was Ja Morant suspended? What's next? What we know about the latest Grizzlies drama
content: Where do things stand between Memphis and its star guard? NBA insiders break down how we got here, and what could come next.

title: Ranking the power conferences to open 2025-26
content: Which league will produce the 2026 national champion? We're tracking the power conferences on the road to the Final Four.

title: Five key questions that will shape the 2026 women's NCAA bracket
content: The SEC race and Big Ten's nonconference performance could have the biggest impact on the women's NCAA bracket.

title: The real Azzi Fudd?  'None of you have seen it'
content: The Most Outstanding Player of last year's Final Four is ready to level up for the Huskies' repeat bid.

title: How Clayton Kershaw's legacy will live on with Dodgers
content: The future Hall of Famer has hung up his spikes, but as L.A.'s dynasty continues, so will his influence.

title: Lindsey Harding, an incredible journey to the Lakers' bench and an unprecedented next step
content: She was the No. 1 pick in the 2007 WNBA draft. She has played all over the world and coached through triumph and horror. Now, Harding is not only a leading voice for JJ Redick, LeBron and the Lakers, but is on the short list for future NBA head coaches.

title: Matchups, preview, how to watch Penguins-Capitals on ESPN+
content: How many more times will we see Crosby vs. Ovechkin? Here are the  stats to know, broadcast details and more.

title: 'He's the best pass rusher': How Nik Bonitto's first step has helped him become an NFL star
content: Bonitto's ability to explode into his pass rush has made him a leader of the Broncos' great defense -- and a Defensive Player of the Year candidate.

title: The Playbook: Lineup locks, Shadow Reports for Week 10
content: An all-encompassing look at the matchups to exploit or avoid and lineup locks in fantasy, as well as projected scores for all NFL games.

title: Trade, pick up or hold? What to do with these four hot fantasy QBs
content: Not all good fantasy QBs do damage with their legs. We highlight four pocket passers who are thriving.

title: Jayden Daniels' injury echoes past Commanders mistakes, raises larger NFL questions
content: The Commanders QB is one of the league's best young players -- and its most-hit over the past two years.

title: Is the Champions League Arsenal's to lose? Ranking the field, Best XI at midway point
content: We're halfway through the league phase of the UEFA Champions League! Which teams are thriving and which teams are struggling? Bill Connelly offers his stock watch, best XI and power rankings so far.

title: Can anyone stop Kansas City? How each team will, won't win it all
content: It's playoff time in the NWSL, but can anyone stop the Kansas City Current from cruising to the title? Here's how every team could win it all -- and the one thing that might hold each of them back.

title: Jake Paul's new fight wish list: Canelo Alvarez, Ryan Garcia, more
content: Jake Paul has fought six fighters off his original wish list of 12. Now the YouTuber-turned-boxer shares a new list of opponents with ESPN.

title: Who's the striker beating Mbappé, Haaland in race for European Golden Shoe?
content: Who has been the most lethal forward in Europe this season? Kylian Mbappé? Erling Haaland? No, it's little-known striker in the Latvian league.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Real Madrid eye Spurs star Van de Ven
content: Real Madrid hold a "genuine interest" in Tottenham Hotspur defender Micky van de Ven. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: Graziano & Fowler: What we're hearing on the Jets, Cowboys, Dolphins, Seahawks and more
content: What's the fallout from the Jets' blockbuster trades? What about other moves that did or did not happen around the league? We have the latest.

title: Winners, losers of a wild trade deadline: Solak weighs in on Jets, Cowboys and Jakobi Meyers
content: Well, things escalated quickly. Which teams made the best -- and worst -- moves before the trade deadline?

title: Don't be surprised if ... Claxton leads the Nets in fantasy points
content: Eric Karabell forecasts what to expect from Nic Claxton, Quentin Grimes, Jusuf Nurkic and Trey Murphy III in the months ahead.

title: What to know ahead of Brazilian Grand Prix sprint weekend
content: Formula 1 has reached round 21 and heads to Interlagos, Brazil for the São Paulo Grand Prix. Everything you need to know for the upcoming sprint weekend.

title: Woman harassed on KSRTC bus in Thiruvananthapuram
content: The woman recorded the video of the harassment and slapped the man on the bus. He was later disembarked from the bus

title: Skill development can’t be looked only from a job or economy point of view: Subroto Bagchi
content: While countries like South Korea and Japan have over 80% formally skilled workers, India has less than 5% skilled workers

title: Rahul Gandhi's presser puts spotlight on Brazilian woman; Internet abuzz with her reaction
content: Mr. Gandhi said a "centralised plan" included a Brazilian model whose photograph was used 22 times at 10 booths in the Rai constituency during last year's Haryana Assembly polls

title: Karnataka High Court directs government to develop unified and technology-driven platform for Bengaluru’s sold waste management
content: In an era where technology offers unprecedented tools for transparency and accountability the continued reliance on archaic, non-transparent methods is no longer tenable, said the court

title: Watch | Coimbatore gang rape: A disturbing pattern behind sexual crimes
content: A shocking gang rape of a college girl in Coimbatore has shaken Tamil Nadu is not an isolated crime. It’s part of a disturbing pattern — attacks on women seen in public with male companions, often involving offenders with a criminal past or even juveniles. Why do such crimes keep repeating?

title: Tamil Nadu officials study Guntur’s waste-to-energy model
content: The representatives Jindal Urban Waste Management Plant give a detailed presentation on the plant’s capacity, waste collection sources, power generation, sales, and ash management processes

title: NBA releases ₹3 crore to red sanders growers in A.P. under ABS mechanism
content: The amount has been disbursed to 199 beneficiaries, covering 198 farmers from Andhra Pradesh and cultivators of red sanders, along with University of Andhra

title: India to question citizens who worked in Myanmar cyberscam centres
content: Officials say the people who are being flown back will not be allowed to go back home immediately as the relevant investigating agencies are trying to find out more details about how they ended up there and what activities they had participating in

title: Minimally-invasive glucose monitoring device developed at IIT-M
content: The system, which displays glucose readings directly on the patch, is designed to function on low power, extending battery life and reducing the frequency of charging

title: Supreme Court condones CBI’s 1,373-day delay in challenging  Amit Jogi’s acquittal in 22-year old murder case
content: Former CM’s son was accused in 2003 murder of NCP leader; acquitted by trial court in 2007; when CBI appealed in 2011, HC said it was too late; Justice Mehta says SC should examine if States can appeal independently of CBI

title: Two dead, three injured in Mumbai train accident
content: The incident occurred around 7 p.m., when four passengers were hit by local train near the pole between Sandhurst Road Railway Station and CSMT station.

title: Bihar Assembly elections: Record 64.66% voting in first phase
content: First phase of Bihar polls peaceful, says EC, thanks voters; BJP says high polling indicates people’s faith in NDA to build a ‘strong Bihar’; grand alliance interprets turnout as a ‘wave of change’

title: Communication of grounds of arrest in writing in accused’s language is a must: Supreme Court
content: Supplied within reasonable time, this is irrespective of the nature of the offence or statute involved, the apex court has held

title: Bihar Assembly elections Phase 1: Tejashwi, Tej Pratap among candidates who faced tough fight
content: Yadav clan’s family feud became political as both Tejashwi and Tej Pratap put candidates against each other

title: SIT arrests former Thiruvabharanam Commissioner in Sabarimala gold theft case
content: K.S. Baiju, who retired as the Thiruvabharanam Commissioner of the Travancore Devaswom Board (TDB) in July 2019, is the seventh accused in the case. Investigators say that Baiju committed a deliberate lapse by being absent from Sabarimala while gold-plated copper plates on the Dwarapalaka idols were dismantled and handed over to the sponsor of the gold-plating work in 2019

title: Woman with muscular dystrophy to appear for equivalency exam at home
content: Permission given considering the 32-year-old Thrissur native’s case as a special one, says Sivankutty

title: Bihar polls: flooded roads, 20-year wait for booth to return to village as voters bat for democracy
content: In Darbhanga’s Kusheshwar Asthan constituency, voters braved flooded roads and difficult terrain to cast their votes, many with their children in tow; in Munger’s Bhimbandh, part of the Maoist-hit Tarapur seat, residents queued up with visible relief and excitement as a polling booth had finally returned to their village after 20 years

title: IIT Patna student wins hackathon
content: Adhithyan V.P. wins first prize for developing an artificial intelligence-powered co-pilot that unifies Jira, GitHub, and Teams to predict risks, optimise workloads, and ensure compliance through intelligent automation

title: U.S. deports promoter of Indian ‘realty firm’ accused of swindling ₹2,000 crore
content: Praveen Kumar Kapoor has been absconding along with two other promoter-directors of the SRS Group, Jitender Kumar Garg, and Sunil Jindal, for several years.

title: People-centred approach to food systems need of the hour: Shakuntala Haraksingh Thilsted
content: Four-day International Conference on Agrarian Change, organised by the Foundation for Agrarian Studies, opens at Kovalam

title: Modi, Shah engage in real ‘jungle raj’ by misuse of ED, CBI: Rahul Gandhi
content: The Congress leader alleged that the Prime Minister “only knows how to spread hatred” and is “pitting people against each other in the name of religion and caste” to win elections

title: NDA headed for 'record-breaking victory' in Bihar: Shivraj Singh Chouhan
content: Rahul Gandhi is already ‘preparing excuses, talking about vote chori’, the Union Minister for Agriculture said in Jehanabad district

title: Venu a victim of  collapse of ‘Arogyakeralam,’ says Satheesan
content: Kollam native had died at the Thiruvananthapuram Government Medical College Hospital on Wednesday night

title: CEO conducts training for Collectors, District Election Officers in Andhra Pradesh on SIR-2026
content: Underlining the need for such an exercise, with the last such conducted 21 years ago, Vivek Yadav says it is the DEOs’ responsibility to assess the need to identify new polling stations by duly considering the fact that no polling station should have more than 1,200 electors

title: Is presence at protest a criminal act, Delhi riots accused asks Supreme Court
content: Shadab Ahmed said the case against him banks on the depositions of police witnesses and referred to two protected witnesses, codenamed Radium and Sodium, arraigned to buttress the police case

title: Kerala local body polls 2025: Various fronts in Thiruvananthapuram Corporation finalise candidates
content: CPI(M) district committee meets on Thursday to finalise its candidates. Party will not be declaring any Mayor candidate before the elections

title: Only ‘revolution’ is Congress coming back to power in 2028: D.K. Shivakumar
content: Dismissing talk about the “November Revolution”, Deputy Chief Minister D.K. Shivakumar has said that the “true revolution” will be Congress coming back to power in 2028”

title: Northern Discom takes up automation of feeder monitoring to minimise downtime in power supply
content: CMD Varun Reddy says the new technology helps engineers identify faulty points to take up restoration work without delay

title: Cabinet gives clearance for building annexe for Nyaya Grama on four acres of land on Hebbal campus
content: The State Cabinet on Thursday gave approval for handing over four acres of land on the Hebbal campus of the Karnataka Veterinary, Animal and Fisheries Sciences University to the judiciary for the construction of residential quarters for judges of the High Court of Karnataka

title: First phase of Palayam market redevelopment to be completed in nine months
content: Redevelopment activities will be carried out within the market area by retaining the 19th century arched gate, which is considered as one of the heritage monuments of the city

title: ECI acting as BJP’s puppet, alleges A.P. Cong. chief Sharmila
content: She alleges that voter lists are concealed, CCTV footage destroyed, and digital records withheld, all to cover up the scam

title: Only 160 POCSO survivors got victim compensation in 2024-25: child rights panel
content: In 2023-24, 346 survivors awarded interim or final compensation, according to a child rights panel report

title: INS Ikshak commissioned into Navy, vessel boosts hydrographic survey capabilities
content: The ceremony was presided over by Admiral Dinesh K. Tripathi, Chief of the Naval Staff; INS Ikshak is also the first survey vessel large (SVL) class designed with dedicated women’s accommodation

title: Arundhati Reddy gets rousing welcome in Hyderabad after World Cup victory
content: “I have dreamt about this moment since I was a  child, and it means a lot to me. Honestly, it hasn’t sunk in yet. I haven’t had time to sit and reflect on it,” she tells The Hindu.

title: Lack of unity in Congress may come in handy for LDF in Kalpetta
content: The UDF, which has historically dominated the area, is grappling with leadership issues and allegations of corruption that have undermined grassroots support. Meanwhile, the LDF is launching a vigorous campaign to reclaim its former stronghold.

title: NDA government committed to curbing substance abuse with iron hand, says Andhra Pradesh Home Minister Anitha
content: Blaming the previous YSRCP government for the proliferation of illegal drugs trade in the State, the Home Minister cites an instance of its student leader caught red-handed on charge of running a racket, and cautions parents to be wary of such anti-social elements

title: SPIC MACAY convention from December 31
content: The convention will bring together students, artistes and volunteers from various parts of Kerala to celebrate Indian classical arts, culture and heritage

title: Railway police intensify raids across Kerala to nab intoxicated passengers
content: Man who overpowered the attacker in the Varkala case identified from CCTV footage. Condition of woman injured in the attack remains critical

title: CPCB report to NGT stating Bidadi Waste-to-Energy plant has failed to monitor toxic pollutants: NGO
content: Leachate generated from the WTE plant was released without any proper monitoring and testing, said the report

title: Bihar polls: Phase 1 sees 'historic' turnout; deputy CM's convoy attacked - key points
content: Bihar's first election phase saw a record 64.66% voter turnout, with enthusiastic participation from women. Despite peaceful polling, stray incidents of violence and accusations between leaders, including deputy CM Vijay Kumar Sinha and RJD MLC Ajay Kumar, were reported. Prashant Kishor's party also made its presence felt, advocating for prohibition law repeal.

title: 'I have no connection': Ajit Pawar on son's Rs 300-cr land case; Fadnavis orders probe
content: Ajit Pawar denies any connection to a controversial Rs 300 crore Pune land deal involving a company linked to his son, Parth Pawar. The state government has formed an inquiry committee to probe alleged irregularities in the sale of government-owned land to Amadea Enterprises, with a tehsildar and sub-registrar suspended.

title: Danish bus fleet at risk: Chinese remote ‘Kill Switch’ found; security loophole ignites probe
content: Danish authorities are investigating a potential security vulnerability in hundreds of Chinese-made electric buses, including Yutong models, that could allow remote deactivation. This concern follows Norwegian findings of remote access to bus control systems, raising fears of operational disruption. The buses are equipped with internet-connected subsystems, including cameras and GPS, which could be exploited.

title: Sulakshana Pandit passes away at 71 after cardiac arrest; funeral to be held tomorrow
content: Veteran singer and actor Sulakshana Pandit, known for her soulful voice and memorable performances in Hindi cinema, passed away on Thursday, November 6, at the age of 71. The singer breathed her last at Nanavati Hospital in Mumbai after a prolonged illness. Her brother, music composer Lalit Pandit, confirmed the heartbreaking news.

title: Watch: Rohit Sharma turns prankster; ex-India pacer surprised
content: Former India captain Rohit Sharma, currently on a break from Tests and T20Is, shared a hilarious prank video on social media. He tricked friends, including cricketers Shardul Thakur and Dhawal Kulkarni, with an electric shock pen, eliciting hearty laughter. This lighthearted moment comes as Sharma prepares for upcoming ODI matches against South Africa.

title: Voting in Delhi then Bihar? Oppn targets BJP leaders; Rakesh Sinha hits back
content: Opposition parties have accused right-wing leaders of voting in multiple states, citing Rakesh Sinha and others as examples of alleged vote theft.  AAP and RJD claim Sinha voted in both Delhi and Bihar elections. Sinha has denied the accusations, saying his voter registration was transferred to Bihar and threatening legal action for defamation.

title: 'I would have dropped out of college if...': Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang to Mark Zuckerberg
content: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang and Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg shared insights on generative AI and their entrepreneurial journeys. Huang humorously wished he'd dropped out of college like Zuckerberg, given Nvidia's long path to becoming a $5 trillion company.

title: ED attaches Raina, Dhawan's Rs 11.14cr assets - what we know so far
content: The Enforcement Directorate has provisionally attached assets worth Rs 11.14 crore belonging to former cricketers Suresh Raina and Shikhar Dhawan. The action stems from an investigation into the illegal offshore betting platform 1xBet, which promoted betting through surrogate brands. Both cricketers allegedly entered endorsement agreements with foreign entities to promote 1xBet, with payments channelled through foreign entities to conceal illicit origins.

title: Mumbai: Two dead, three injured in local train accident amid strike
content: Two people died and three were injured when a suburban train struck them near Sandhurst Road railway station in Mumbai. The incident followed a protest by railway unions that disrupted services. This disruption caused overcrowding and stranded passengers. The protest was against an FIR filed in connection with a previous train accident.

title: Indians are the kind of immigrants US needs more of - why Trump should take notice
content: New research reveals Indian immigrants are potentially the most economically beneficial group in the US, significantly reducing national debt and boosting GDP. The study highlights how education and skilled visas, like H-1B, drive substantial fiscal contributions, urging policy reforms to prioritize high-skilled immigration for economic growth and debt reduction.

title: Jeff Bezos’ ex-wife MacKenzie Scott makes large donation; focus on education
content: MacKenzie Scott has gifted Howard University $80 million, one of the largest single donations in its history, to support general operations and its College of Medicine. This significant contribution arrives as the university faces delays in federal funding due to a government shutdown. The donation continues Scott's recent pattern of substantial gifts to diversity, equity, and inclusion initiatives.

title: India yet to lose T20I series under coach Gambhir: A look at his streak
content: India secured a commanding 48-run victory against Australia in the fourth T20I. This win gives India a 2-1 series lead. Under coach Gautam Gambhir, the team remains unbeaten in the T20 series. India posted 167/8, with Shubman Gill scoring 46. Washington Sundar took three wickets. Australia was bowled out for 119. India's T20 unit appears strong.

title: 'My final year of service': Nancy Pelosi says she won't seek re-election to Congress - video
content: Veteran Democrat Nancy Pelosi, 85, announced she will not seek re-election to Congress after four decades, concluding her term as the first female Speaker of the House. Her departure follows a significant political victory with California's congressional map reshaping. Pelosi's influential career included steering major legislation and leading impeachments of Donald Trump.

title: ' Criminal ... drunk!' Bihar dy CM, RJD leader hurl insults over convoy attack - watch
content: Bihar deputy CM Vijay Kumar Sinha and RJD MLC Ajay Kumar engaged in a heated exchange during the first phase of elections. Sinha alleged his convoy was attacked with cow dung, while Kumar accused Sinha of intimidating voters. Both leaders traded insults, with Sinha blaming Kumar's men for stopping their vehicle and engaging in hooliganism.

title: Shohei Ohtani’s wife Mamiko Tanaka’s ‘marry my mom’ parade moment goes viral
content: Los Angeles erupted in joy as the Dodgers clinched the World Series. During the celebratory parade, a fan's "Marry my mom" sign brought laughter, even prompting Shohei Ohtani's wife, Mamiko Tanaka, to playfully cover his eyes. This heartwarming, viral moment highlighted the couple's charming dynamic amidst the team's historic triumph.

title: Bo Nix active for Broncos vs Raiders tonight: Latest injury update
content: Denver Broncos star Bo Nix is set to play against the Las Vegas Raiders tonight. The Broncos have won seven of nine games this season. Nix, who played with back fractures last season, appears healthy. Other players like Pat Surtain and Marvin Mims are out due to injuries. The game starts at 8:15 p.m.

title: Pak breaks truce again: Civilian areas shelled, says Kabul; peace talks on
content: Pakistan has reportedly violated the ceasefire by firing into Afghanistan, even as officials meet in Istanbul for renewed talks with Taliban representatives. This comes after a previous agreement for a ceasefire and a monitoring mechanism, following deadly border clashes. The ongoing discussions aim to de-escalate tensions between the neighbours.

title: Rashmika and Vijay’s wedding date revealed; destination wedding in Udaipur - Report
content: Rashmika Mandanna and Vijay Deverakonda are reportedly planning a grand wedding. Following a private engagement last October, the couple is rumored to be tying the knot on February 26, 2026. Reports suggest a royal destination wedding in Udaipur. Fans eagerly await confirmation from the popular actors. Both stars have upcoming film projects.

title: 'GOAT': Ex-Aus captain hails Kohli; calls him 'once-in-a-generation' player
content: Former Australian captain Steve Waugh has hailed Virat Kohli as the "greatest one-day player of all time" and a "once-in-a-generation" talent. Waugh praised Kohli's batting prowess and consistency in limited-overs cricket, noting his record 51 ODI centuries. He also commented on India's evolving T20 setup post-Kohli and Rohit's retirements from the format.

title: 'For treatment': Gujarat HC grants bail to Asaram; serving life term in 2013 rape case
content: Godman Asaram has been granted six months' bail by the Gujarat high court for medical treatment, mirroring a similar bail granted by the Rajasthan high court. He is serving a life sentence in the Gujarat case for raping a disciple between 2001 and 2006. Asaram also faces a life sentence in a separate rape case in Rajasthan.

title: IND vs AUS: 4th T20I - India take 2-1 series lead with dominant bowling display
content: India secured an unassailable 2-1 series lead against Australia with a commanding 48-run victory in the fourth T20I. A disciplined bowling attack, spearheaded by Washington Sundar's exceptional death overs, stifled Australia's chase after they were set a target of 168. This win highlights India's composure and adaptability under captain Suryakumar Yadav.

title: Historic! Sheetal Devi earns spot in able-bodied Asia Cup; first para-archer to do so
content: In a historic first, India's armless para-archer Sheetal Devi has been selected for the Indian able-bodied junior team for the Asia Cup Stage 3. The 18-year-old world champion secured third place in national trials, competing alongside over 60 able-bodied archers. This achievement marks a significant step towards her dream of competing with able-bodied athletes.

title: WPL Retentions: Harman, Smriti, Shafali kept; Lanning, Deepti released ahead of auction
content: WPL franchises unveiled their retained players, with Indian stars Harmanpreet Kaur, Smriti Mandhana, Jemimah Rodrigues, and Shafali Verma headlining the list. Mumbai Indians and Delhi Capitals kept five players each, while UP Warriorz released several marquee names, including Deepti Sharma. A high-stakes mega auction is set for November 27.

title: 'They welcome infiltrators': Shah takes jibe at Lalu 'chacha' & Rahul at Bihar rally
content: Amit Shah on Thursday took swipe at Rahul Gandhi and Lalu Prasad Yadav, accusing them of supporting infiltrators and warning of a return to 'jungle raj' if the opposition wins. Shah asserted the BJP-NDA's commitment to making Bihar 'infiltrator-free' and highlighted PM Modi's decisive action against terrorism, contrasting it with past Congress governments.

title: What made SRK’s Kabir Khan unforgettable in Chak De! India
content: Shah Rukh Khan's portrayal of Kabir Khan in 'Chak De! India' continues to resonate, showcasing a coach who embraced risks, confronted his past, and masterfully managed ego clashes. Khan's belief in respect and unity in diversity forged a formidable women's hockey team, proving that differences can unite a nation towards victory.

title: ‘Govinda accepted’: IPS officer reveals celebrities did a show for Dawood’s daughter
content: In the 1990s, Bollywood's glamour was overshadowed by underworld influence, with gangsters financing hit films like 'Satya' and 'Company' to enhance their image. Actors and producers lived under constant threat, forced to comply with demands from figures like Dawood Ibrahim, as revealed by former Joint CP Crime Mumbai D Sivanandhan.

title: Raina, Dhawan under ED lens: Assets worth Rs 11cr attached; action in betting app case
content: The Enforcement Directorate has attached assets worth over Rs 11 crore belonging to cricketers Suresh Raina and Shikhar Dhawan in a money-laundering probe linked to the betting platform 1xBet. Investigations are examining their endorsement deals and the platform's alleged user fraud and tax evasion. The ED's crackdown targets illegal betting apps nationwide.

title: Watch: Women try to perform puja at disputed mausoleum; clash with police
content: Tension flared in Uttar Pradesh's Fatehpur as women attempted to offer prayers at a disputed mausoleum on Kartik Purnima. Police intervened, leading to a clash when some women tried to breach barricades. The group eventually performed prayers from a nearby lane, while authorities maintain the site's status is sub judice.

title: '8 planes shot down': Trump updates India-Pak conflict claims; adds new details
content: President Trump claimed he brokered a ceasefire between India and Pakistan by linking it to trade deals, stating they agreed to peace after he threatened tariffs.  He asserted this intervention resolved eight wars during his tenure. However, India has consistently denied any US involvement in the truce.

title: Banality of evil: German nurse kills 10 patients - to reduce workload
content: The court in Aachen called it a crime of “particular severity of guilt,” ensuring he will never walk free again. But what’s truly chilling is not just the scale of his actions — it’s their ordinariness. A man trained since 2007 to heal became, by 2024, an executioner in scrubs, armed not with malice but with indifference.

title: IND vs AUS: 'Smart cricket' - Suryakumar hails India batters after big win vs Australia
content: India secured a 48-run victory over Australia in the fourth T20I, taking an unassailable 2-1 series lead. Skipper Suryakumar Yadav praised the team's smart batting and tactical awareness, while disciplined bowling, particularly from Axar Patel and Washington Sundar, stifled Australia's chase.  The win was attributed to a complete team effort.

title: 'Will run bulldozer': Bihar dy CM after dung thrown at convoy; EC seeks action
content: Bihar Deputy Chief Minister Vijay Kumar Sinha accused RJD supporters of attacking his convoy and hurling stones and cow dung. He reprimanded the Lakhisarai SP, calling him "weak and cowardly" for failing to control the situation and prevent voters from exercising their franchise. The SP stated tensions arose upon Sinha's arrival.

title: IND vs AUS: Arshdeep's catch swings momentum in India's favour - Watch
content: Arshdeep Singh's spectacular catch to dismiss Australian skipper Mitchell Marsh proved a pivotal moment in India's hard-fought victory.  The athletic grab, following a clever slower ball from Shivam Dube, broke a dangerous partnership and reignited India's control. This brilliant fielding display underscored the team's improved standards under Suryakumar Yadav's captaincy, providing a crucial spark in a low-scoring encounter.

title: Women's World Cup: Team India meets President Murmu; gifts jersey
content: The World Cup-winning Indian women's cricket team met President Droupadi Murmu at Rashtrapati Bhavan, where captain Harmanpreet Kaur presented a signed team jersey. President Murmu congratulated the team on their historic achievement, emphasizing their role as inspiration and a reflection of a united India. The team also met Prime Minister Narendra Modi earlier.

title: Woman’s headless body with severed hands found floating in Noida drain
content: A headless body of a woman was discovered floating in a drain near Sector 82 on Thursday afternoon. A sweeper alerted authorities after noticing the grim discovery around noon. Police have recovered the body and are currently working to ascertain the woman's identity.

title: Ajit Pawar’s son Parth in Rs 300-cr land deal controversy: Sub-registrar suspended
content: In a shocking turn of events, a lucrative Rs 300-crore land transaction in Pune has embroiled Deputy CM Ajit Pawar's son, Parth Pawar, prompting the suspension of a sub-registrar and an extensive investigation by top officials.

title: IND A vs SA A: Jurel scores unbeaten century; rest don't cross 24 runs
content: Dhruv Jurel's unbeaten century was the highlight for India A on Day 1 against South Africa A, rescuing the team from a precarious 59/4. His resilient 132, including a vital partnership with Kuldeep Yadav, propelled India A to 255 all out. Jurel's performance underscores his growing reputation as a dependable middle-order batter.

title: ‘Haq’ movie row: HC junks plea by Shah Bano's daughter against Hashmi-starrer
content: The Madhya Pradesh high court dismissed a plea by Shah Bano Begum's daughter seeking to halt the release of the Bollywood film 'Haq'. The court found no merit in the defamation or rights violation claims, allowing the Emraan Hashmi and Yami Gautam Dhar starrer to proceed with its theatrical release.

title: ‘New scam’: Bengaluru woman exposes Rapido driver’s fake app; company suspends him
content: A Bengaluru woman has warned commuters about a new Rapido scam where drivers allegedly use fake apps to inflate fares. The driver presented a counterfeit app showing a higher charge, and the ride was not recorded on the genuine Rapido account, preventing complaints. Rapido has since suspended the driver's account.

title: ‘Perfume you can eat’: Mamdani’s 'Rajnigandha' moment just before NYC poll win— Watch
content: New York City mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani's victory was amplified by a viral video of him casually consuming Rajnigandha, a popular Indian mouth freshener. The light-hearted clip, shared widely, resonated with Indian users who flooded social media with memes and celebratory comments, highlighting a cultural connection amidst his historic win.

title: 'New York City’s 111th mayor': Priyanka Chopra congratulates Zohran Mamdani
content: Priyanka Chopra congratulated Zohran Mamdani on Instagram for becoming New York City’s youngest and first Muslim mayor. Son of filmmaker Mira Nair, Zohran made history at 34. Priyanka moved to New York in 2016, married Nick Jonas in 2018, and they now live there with their daughter Malti Marie.

title: Delhi Man Stabs Friend Who Failed To Get Him A "Second Wife" For Rs 60,000: Cops
content: Two friends stabbed each other in Delhi's Rohini area after a heated argument erupted over one of them failing to "arrange a second wife" for the other despite taking Rs 60,000 for the task, police said on Thursday.

title: India's Real Estate Sector Likely To Hit $10 Trillion By 2047: Report
content: India's real estate sector is at the cusp of a monumental and transformative journey and is projected to grow multifold levels-from nearly $0.3 trillion today to a staggering $5-10 trillion market by 2047, according to a Colliers-CII report.

title: Grounds Of Arrest In Writing Mandatory For All Offences: Supreme Court
content: In a landmark verdict, the Supreme Court on Thursday held that every arrested person must be furnished with the grounds of arrest in writing and in a language they understand, irrespective of the nature of the offence or statute involved.

title: Man Serves Jail Time Over Name Mix-Up, Gets Rs 2 Lakh Compensation
content: The Madhya Pradesh High Court's division bench has imposed a fine of Rs 2 lakh on Shahdol Collector Kedar Singh in connection with wrongful action taken under the National Security Act (NSA).

title: Video: Furious Face-Off Between Nitish Kumar's Deputy, RJD Leader On Poll Day
content: Bihar assembly elections in its first phase today was marked several unsavoury episodes, including a dung attack on Deputy Chief Minister Vijay Sinha, attack on a CPI-ML leader's car and RJD's Bhai Virendra Singh publicly threatening a poll official.

title: Jyotiraditya Scindia's Comment Sparks Buzz Over Son's Political Entry
content: Union Minister and Maharaja of the Gwalior royal family, Jyotiraditya Scindia, has once again become the talk of the town, this time over a personal revelation about his son, Mahan Aryaman Scindias marriage prospects.

title: Zohran Mamdani Picks All-Women Team For 'New Solutions To Old Problems'
content: Zohran Mamdani will be the city’s first Muslim mayor, the first of South Asian heritage, the first born in Africa, and the youngest in more than a century.

title: Man Kills Pregnant Live-In Partner In Gurugram Over Money Dispute
content: Police have arrested an auto-rickshaw driver for allegedly strangling his pregnant live-in partner to death over frequent requests for money to manage pregnancy expenses, officials said on Thursday.

title: Why White House Photos Of Xi Jinping Laughing Will Not Be Released In China
content: Chinese President Xi Jinping is not usually associated with an ecstatic smile. That is because the country's government, along with the state media, has worked hard to build a reputation of seriousness.

title: India To Become Global Leader In Sustainable Aviation Fuel: Report
content: India's aviation market, the fifth-largest globally, is projected to become the third by 2030, and set to emerge as a global leader in Sustainable Aviation Fuel production.

title: Mumbai Cabbie Creates Woman's Fake Insta Account After Dispute Over Toll Fee
content: A driver attached to a ride-sharing platform has been booked for allegedly creating a fake Instagram account of a woman and labelling her a "call girl" after she refused to pay toll during a trip, police said on Thursday.

title: Man Robbed, Loses Leg. Cops Take Him To Hospital, Leave Limb Behind
content: A labourer was robbed of Rs 500 by four men and his leg was held on a railway track until a train ran over it, severing the limb, in Madhya Pradesh's Ujjain on Wednesday.

title: From Shawarma To Rajnigandha: Zohran Mamdani's Viral South-Asian Moment
content: A short clip of New York City's newly elected mayor, Zohran Mamdani, casually munching on Rajnigandha mouth freshener during a street chat with content creator Nicolas Nuvan has taken social media by storm.

title: Israel Launches Airstrikes On Lebanon, Says It's Targeting Hezbollah
content: The Israeli military carried out heavy airstrikes on southern Lebanon on Thursday after issuing evacuation orders for several locations, saying Lebanese armed group Hezbollah was trying to rebuild its military capabilities there.

title: Calcutta High Court Judge Recuses From Hearing RG Kar Rape And Murder Case
content: Justice Debangshu Basak, the "lead judge" or a "senior judge" of a division bench of the Calcutta High Court hearing the RG Kar rape and murder case, on Thursday, recused from hearing the matter.

title: PM Modi Praises 'Vande Mataram' On Eve Of Its 150th Anniversary
content: On the eve of the 150th anniversary of "Vande Mataram", Prime Minister Narendra Modi hailed the song that ignited an undying spirit of patriotism across our nation.

title: 2 Killed, 3 Injured After Being Hit By Local Train In Mumbai
content: Two people died and three sustained injuries after they were hit by a suburban train near Sandhurst Road railway station in south Mumbai on Thursday, officials said.

title: Delhi Fire Service Took Over 4 Lakh Emergency Calls In 15 Years
content: In the last 15 years till 2024, the Delhi Fire Service received more than 4 lakh emergency calls, while 6,611 people in the national capital lost their lives in mishaps, including fire, building collapse and road crashes.

title: Bangladesh Okays Death Penalty For Enforced Disappearances
content: Bangladesh's government approved a draft ordinance prescribing the death penalty for perpetrators of "enforced disappearance", amidthe ongoing trial of ousted prime minister Sheikh Hasina and 15 serving military officers over crimes against humanity.

title: "Prayed For It To Stop": Freed Israeli Hostage Claims Sex Abuse In Gaza
content: A recently freed Israeli hostage was the first man who publicly claimed that he was sexually assaulted while being held captive in Gaza.

title: Be Nitish, Tejashwi or PK for a minute — can you win Bihar?

title: NHL prospect pipeline rankings: Sharks, Islanders, then ...?
